Apache Spark skew optimization(불균형 데이터 최적화)

Jaemun Jung May 1 2021-05-01T01:43:00+09:00
1 min

Reference

https://databricks.com/session_eu19/apache-spark-core-practical-optimization

https://medium.com/road-to-data-engineering/spark-performance-optimization-series-1-skew-2762a0f288c https://docs.databricks.com/delta/join-performance/skew-join.html https://docs.databricks.com/spark/latest/spark-sql/aqe.html https://itnext.io/handling-data-skew-in-apache-spark-9f56343e58e8?gi=bbd8d937c1e1

https://www.slideshare.net/jcmia1/a-beginners-guide-on-troubleshooting-spark-applications 17p. parquet과 HDFS의 block size를 맞추자!
